name: Easy Pumpkin Cheesecake
instructions: Prepare crust in cheesecake mix according to directions, in a 9‚Äù pie plate.
Chill in freezer while preparing pie filling.
In small bowl combine cheesecake mix, 1 t. cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves.
Beat at low speed of mixer until blended; beat 3 minutes at medium speed.
